item.title: GM To Reportedly Lay Off Employees At Detroit, Tennessee And Ohio Amid EV Demand Slowdown
Nokia Sees Price Target Hikes After Nvidia’s $1B Investment
item.description: Bank of America raised its price target on Nokia to $8.07 from $4.64 and maintained a ‘Neutral’ rating, according to TheFly.

item.title: Etsy Names Kruti Patel Goyal As Next CEO, Stock Slides On Lower Sales Outlook
item.description: Josh Silverman will remain on board as Executive Chair through December 31, 2026.

item.title: Fubo Stock Gains As Disney Merger Creates Sixth-Largest Pay TV Platform In US
item.description: The combined business will maintain Fubo and Hulu + Live TV as separate services, offering multiple plan tiers and distinct apps.

item.title: Pending Home Sales Stall In September Amid Labor Market Concerns, Even As Mortgage Rates Drop To Lowest Level In Over A Year
item.description: According to data from the National Association of Realtors, an index of contract signings was flat in September at 74.8, after rising by 4.2% in Augu...
